snippet.title: Crystal Mines 2 Buried Treasure | Atari Lynx Collection 1 | Game 3 of 17 | Evercade Handheld
snippet.description:
The original 1992 game featured 181 levels, then Songbird followed up with a 2003 release featuring an additional 125 all-new levels, giving you more puzzle-solving, action-adventure gaming than most people can handle. A thoughtful balance of contemplative and anxiety-inducing, this game is a unique experience all of its own.

Taking a break can sometimes make a difficult stage much easier. Don't let the game get to you!

Year: 1992, 2003
Publisher: Atari Corporation (original), Songbird Productions (current)
Genre: Puzzle
